title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers (via proxy) to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, completion, and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting streaming, embeddings, and custom model creation.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder components.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing retrieval-augmented generation with Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration injecting Ollama4j client beans for rapid prototyping.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to invoke local Ollama models for content generation.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for quantized variants of CodeLlama, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a sidebar chat and inline prompt commands backed by Ollama.
